data.text: My kids and I love this game and gace had it for a long time, payed for no adds. And have a Tom over level 60. But I give 1 star because here the past couple days. The fly points wont go up past 102. And the mini/ bonas games wont load at all. It is upsetting because The worm/ snake game 8s the only thing i really like to do. And it wont load. I have uninstalled it and reinstalled it amd it wont work right. Please please fix this glitch?

Request/Feedback:The game is AWESOME! I just wish it had more options. Such as wrist accesories and head accesories separated from the hair. What I mean by that is everything I try to put on the hair it's considered as a hat so I would like there to be hair options. Also when you put Tom to sleep can you make the background turn dark like it's night-time? Sort of like when you put My Talking Angela (2) to sleep. Then you can also see the places you can visit including her house.

I used to play this game as a child. It had a feature where it was hard to get some super rare items, and it took time to get them. I would spend hours hoping to get them and I would miss being able to show my rare items to my friends. Now they had an update where every item has no rarity and costs 3-10 coins. It's incredibly boring now since there's not reason to play for rarity.

This app is great. Although, when I got it, it was glitchy. Tom's room, where the bed is, it is very glitchy. I try and color, but the coloring pages are black, so are the crayons it also gets glitchy. I reset, but it still didnt work. I find it very strange. Another glitch is the thought bubble. It is completely black. I can email you screenshots, all I need is your team's email. Also, it does run a little slow. But I find all the features really fun. Thank you.

The game is cool and a lot better than My Talking Tom, except for in terms of clothes, accessories and decorations. Wish there were more selection in these categories. The mini games are also cooler. Except for the controls in Space Trail. They're extremely wonky and the snake is hard to control. I also don't like getting duplicate cards. So to recap: More clothes, accessories, decorations, get rid of the chances of getting duplicates, and fix the controls in Space Trail, and I'll rate higher. Also, the game keeps crashing and freezing to the point were I have to exit out.

So far, my daughter loves the game. However, I'm noticing when we have the option to spin the wheel, she never gets more than 20 or 30 airplanes or 5-10 coins. I watch ad after ad trying to get extra spins to try to earn things for her and I get the same results. I can see every few spins getting the lowest prize, but every single time? This is very frustrating.

It's a good game for the most part. But there should be more variety of mini games, even the ones from the original My Talking Tom would do. The mini games are bland in my opinion. I like the concept of Tom having his own pet, but each of them should have a different voice. I like the idea of using a plane to get gifts, but getting coins and stars can be difficult. I would recommend adding coins to mini games with the plane fuel. There should also be a larger variety of clothing for Tom.

I absolutely LOVED the first talking tom game and was so excited when I learned there was a second, only to be utterly dissapointed. It's so full of ads that getting to the actual gameplay is a chore especially since every ad is normally no less than 30 seconds long and un-skippable. The customization is also very limited and was one of my main let downs when compared to the first game, I would strongly advise not getting this game unless you enjoy watching ads to get any progress.

I like it, however there are way too many ads. As well as the app needs an offline mode. Also you need a Space Trails app. As well I wish that the √ó5 effect for the game pad lasted all day like the little toy area when you use the slingshot and the pad. The Space Trails mini game needs to have a different way to control the character when moving like a joystick.

It's ok for keeping my child entertained but has little to no educational value. STRICTLY FOR ENTERTAINMENT. They really like the Talking Tom videos on YouTube and the Talking Tom commercials. The app will slow down your phone after awhile. You will need to reinstall it and lose everything. My child is 4 so doesn't know the difference. There are a lot of commercials you will need to close them at first, but my kid figured it out. He also figured out how to download other games as well.Good Luck

My son enjoys the game. He is 3 years old and keeps getting caught up in the ad screens. I paid for the subscription to remove the adds and there's still a gift box balloon on the home screen for ads and it keeps needing my attention. It's very annoying. I paid for NO ads and there are still ads. It's not a cheap subscription either it's like 15 ish a month and again there's still too many ads! If that's not made better I'll just cancel the subscription.

Its a very good game! Its just one thing. When I try to watch an ad. It dosen't work it takes me out of the game and puts me on my home screen. Please fix this bug. Its just so annoying. And i can't play the game right if this keeps happening. Please fix this bug. I'll try to play the game right untill its fixed. And i really want more fuel and also i want him awake longer and when i try a ad for him to be awake it'll do the same thing. Thank you.

Love it. Just the right type of in app purchases where you can earn for free but still buy it, and not only being able to earn by buying. Best pet game ive played. There are a lot of ads, but can easily be removed by just buying something(lowest being a dollar). The game is super easy to use and play. Lots of games and really fun. Woop.

This game is pretty okay for being a kids game, but I had recieved an interactive ad that after a certain period of time goes to the play store. I understand that, as that happens a lot anyways with ads. The one thing is that it kept redirecting me to google play, no matter if I pressed the back button or specifically went back in the app. If you have ads for your game, at least filter the junk out first.

I love Tom and Tom 2 and I don't mind watching the videos that advertise different games. in fact it's better than paying for special items and it can often be fun. BUT they've recently started advertising for "Kick the buddy". you don't just kick the buddy...(example) you stab him, shoot him, hang and whatever else it tells you to do and you can not exit out of it. so when my 5 year old boy plays Tom he's forced to play the other top continue on to the remainder of the commercial/ game play.

It's a good game, and it really relieves my stress or anger. The ads aren't invading or anything. But, I think you should add a little more food and clothes. I get a lot of money and diamonds fast and I like that, but I really want to buy other things now that I have bought everything on the game. I also want more house designs and painting's. Because it only took me 3 days to basically finish the whole game. But besides that nice and educational game!!

This games is really nice. You raise your own kitten to full grown cat. You can name it, style it, and customize your own home. You get to travel all over the world to earn rewards. There's mini games to play that are really good and addicting! You can spend a whole day on those mini games. You can even feed the cat and cook for it. But one thing is that I miss one and only one feature from the original My Talking Tom 1, More selections for clothing, not premade outfits.

This game is awesome. My favorite game is space trails. I don't have much to say, but it is still a really good game. But sometimes when I play space trails, it says that there is no internet but there is. 4 stars. So people who made it, there is something wrong with the internet and the game. When I am winning in space trails, it says there is no internet and everyone else takes my space dust. That happens sometimes with other players to. CHANGE THAT NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!! üò°üò°üëøüëø Sleeps a lot to.

Too many ads.I have to physically set by my 6 yr old to make sure he doesn't push the ads on accident. Also kept of the speaker/voice OFF so not sure if vocals are appropriate or not but he loves it and it has heat little games with in the game. Not sure how long it's going to stay o the phone but i t looks to be a good game except for the ads " ).

Absolutely love this game but wish you could unlock more islands and the game gave you more things to unlock after you already unlocked the everything to a island. Also wish the game would give more opportunities to unlock special items and new ones. The game is starting to get boring because I've unlocked almost everything and still no new opportunities to unlock new features or islands etc.

Wow, so many FAKE 5 star reviews were spammed on here after my review. So obviously phoney and all from India?! ORIGINAL: TOO MANY ADS! I had an older version on my last phone and it was great. I put this version on my new phone and things sure have changed. Lot's of new features and activities; but unfortunately there is a pop-up ad every time I touch something on the screen and many of the ads can't be backed out of, including a 30 second video! I'll be uninstalling this monstrosity shortly.

I cant play space trails without it crashing. nothing seems to help to "troubleshoot " the problem. deleted this game bc of that. prior to the new "upgrade" it worked fine. do not recommend outfit 7 for games as it constantly crashes. highly disappointed and very upset!!! if you're going to make an upgrade, then make it better. not worse!

So many ads it's ridiculous. I'm almost tempted not to purchase the $3 no ads because I assume there will still be ads somewhere. Ads have hidden x buttons so toddlers can't get out of the ads that happen literally 3 times in one minute. I counted. It's kinda messed up and predatory predatory practice.

This is my favorite game and it is not boring because there are so many options like a challenge that you can win and have a prizes but it is so hard to get what you want. Also it has a new update where they removed the blue stars and there was just coins and also there are 10,000 Coins bonus and i really love it, also the items you want to buy costs cheaper than before. I really like this game and i rate it 5 stars.

Just like everyone else I used to play this game you used to have to unlock the islands with your level. The amount of starter coins you get is kinda dumb. Like one time I just tapped buy over and over again and now the only ones I don't have are the ones you need to earn.

It's okay at first, but after awhile there are tons of ads all of a sudden. Most people would have already reviewed the app by then so they don't reflect on the true nature of the game. I get ads every time I switch rooms and it is very annoying. Game is also very slow at this point

I love this game especially since the update,they give you like 1m coins(which is nice since mostly kids play this) and the items are cheaper.Very few things need you to watch ads and the plaine gas is easinly obtainable. But the game gets boring after a bit,the only thing thats keeping it alive for me is that space trail game. I would also like to ad that its also nice to play offline, there are no ads and you can pay for most ad things which is good for younger kids! Love the design of Tom too

It is a really good game I really like the mini game of space trails and I like how you start with 100,00 ü™ô but since it isn't a game that has rounds I don't think the ads are playing a good role there so please change this and I don't know what you should add to make it for also older people because it is a bit boring I only keep the game for space trails.

beyond frustrated with this app. i made a purchase in order to lose ads some time ago, and now the ads are back. what's even worse is, i cannot find the option to turn it off again. and i looked everywhere. Why can't you make the friggin option visible? why am i seeing ads again? will delete the whole shebang if i do not find out soon.

I just love it and the pet den makes it the best so the video game is pretty awesome! üíØüíØüíØ It's because that. Tom you get 100,000 coins and that's the way I like talking Tom 2 but there's one more way that makes it awesome. It's because that you get to watch an ad to get the fifth food

It has ads. Don't worry about the ads. It cannot be shown when offline. You can skip the ads. Or if you want to fix things, just watch the ads. Want to have more coins? Click here to get more! Download the latest version of our game to find more information on My Talking Tom 1 and My Talking Tom 2. It has a lot of fun and it has some problems. We have a number of different types of games including the ads and the different types of games. The ads are not just the same ads. So that's the story!!!

I give three stars because i do everything and i cant make tom cancel the baby potion effect. For example peoples tom are teen or adult in level 25 or 15 while mine is level 25 and is still baby! Please do somethimg with that i dont wanna lose my progress!! Anyways a good game.

This game is so great, especially the update! It's one great game and outfit7 did a good job! Although the reason why I'm giving this a 4 Star is that there's a bug in the pet den, no matter how many toy time I have, the game treats that I have one toy left... also, I want our big prices and small money back. I've got almost everything from the game and I'm getting bored.
this game is very nice and I also love the way Tom do the things like going to the toilet,this game is nice and sometimes its boring but nice let me say this game is AWESOME

The pets will like one coin each. And I literally got so much food from it. I don't know if that's normal or not. And I also never had it on my phone

I used to love this game back in early 2022 and 2021, except clothes are a little hard to get. Please make it kinda easy :) but all the activities are very fun to do! This is the best game I had ever played. Also the extra games that appear on television are amazing. The way talking tom talk is wonderful. My brother, cousin e.t.c have a good entertainment by playing this game.

I would have to say THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER! I would rate it five stars because... 1-Its fun 2-No ads 3-To take care of a pet. This game is fun for me and my sister I would rate it 5 stars Amazing!

Ad after ad after ad. Even worse here than on the first. A bright colorful box that will grab a child's attention but it's an ad. Sickening that anyone would try to make their millions off of manipulating kids into clicking onto ad for Christ sake.

This game is amazing no ads ( except for pop up ads when Tom goes to sleep) still completely playable the Mrbeast colab with this game was sick. I love that you could complete every style of your choice from the cards and also I love that they give you so much money to be able to buy stuff. I let my sister play this game and she LOVES it! I recommend this game.

it's an amazing game. but I think its gonna need more 3d display on the game or graphic performance, but I like it and the Tom 1... üéÆüíï it's ez to play and I think you need to remove the 100000 money of Tom. atleast we are gonna get it on the level mission. because it's like hacked, like the game Angela 2 it has 1000000 money I want it to claim the money on my own achievement like before tnx to the creator I'm entertained wish more games from you to come üéÆüëæ...

its so fun! You can challenge other people in the game and you can customize how you look its so satisfying and fun!
I like this game I just don't like the adds but if you guys delete the ads I'll probably give it a five stars I love this game still I probably keep this game for a long time!
It is so fun for kids. My daughter loves this game . Sometimes older son too plays this game ,It is also fun for him.

Game is very good I like when they give the new update 1 million coins especially I like the game in this is very good good game I like talking game this is very realistic especially Tom when listen our voice and his puppet

Very good game because many years before I post a comment that all the things are very costly they should less the rate etc. And I deleted the game but now just few days before only when l downloaded the game again I started from my old data and l have lots of money, and ratings(cost) of everything is now least you can buy anything and my favorite part is that now the diamonds option is gone now no need of diamonds and which is very good .

My 3 year old loves this, but the ads are ridiculous. There are so many, and it's hard to even get back to the game. She can't do it by herself, and even I get frustrated trying every minute or two. Another great game ruined by ads. Uninstalling.

l love the talking tom game. But l have some suggestions 1 l want you to make tom talk and we will answer him 2 l want you to put like pot , spoon like kitchen utensils to make real food for tom not only those foods that he is eating.

Ok I like it but a few dislikes 1-the money,ik u get 10,000 coins when you install it I was so happy but,now I feel a bit bored,I brought everything the clothes,the pets,the furniture,everything (exept the police one) I wanted to be cheap it's my feeling I liked being rich but I felt a bit bored 2-the fact the stars went missing,yes when I got 10,000 coins,I lost the stars but why can't you make 10,000 stars?? 3-the amount of ads,it was so frustrating for the ads to pop up But great game,bai.

Guys do not download this this was an awesome game but then I just stopped playing and the notifications were getting more creepy Tom was actually looking mad when I joined I later uninstalled so trust me to not download this

Its a nice game, too many ads and whenever i open the chests i ALWAYS get a silver card and duplicates... And whenever i watch an ad for free fuel after the ad there's a black screen and after 1 or 2 mins it says the app isn't responding, close it or wait or report problem, these are the only things that annoy me. Everything else is very good and it also makes my phones temperature high. Everything else is very good and fun. but I'm still not satisfied with the above problems. pls fix them

I did enjoy this game... it is fun and child friendly. However I do not like the fact that there is a lot of ads and some of them are very long. Also the game could use more mini games rather than ads. I enjoy space trails and enjoy rating the other cats however Tom gets tired very quickly. The items in the game including Tom's food, clothes and home decor, are expensive and the game doesn't offer enough coins to buy them... So overal it is a good game to pass the time but it has its perks

I like this game a lot, I loved the first talking Tom but this one definitely has a lot more content like different costumes mini games and more! But of I'm honest there's a few things I don't like. First how ads pop up, I have no problem with having to watch ads because that's how they get money and stuff, but I don't like how an ad can pop up just by me switching rooms. Also leveling up takes a lot of time to do. I take care of my Tom pretty frequently, but it still takes a while to level up

I used to play Talking Tom 1 as a kid and thought was great. I like that this one offers more to do, however the adds need to cut back. I use the adventure option to dress Tom, however constantly getting double ups.
